limit.description: Max packages to return (default: 20, max: 100). For list operation.

filter.description: Filter packages by name (case-insensitive contains). For list operation.

offset.description: Skip first N packages for pagination. For list operation.

since.description: Time filter in adb logcat -T format (e.g., '01-20 15:30:00.000')

taskName.description: Task name for baseline operations. Defaults to operation name.

id.description: Build or test ID from previous operation

nearestTo.description: Find elements nearest to this text (spatial proximity)

elementIndex.description: Element index from last find (for tap)

inline.description: Return base64 image data (default: true). Set to false to save to file instead.

debug.description: Include source (accessibility/ocr) and confidence in response

gridCell.description: Grid cell number (1-24) for Tier 5 refinement

deviceSpace.description: For tap: treat x/y as device coordinates (skip imageâ†’device scaling). Use when coordinates come from adb shell input tap testing.

maxDimension.description: Max image dimension in pixels (default: 1000). Higher = better quality, more tokens.

raw.description: Skip scaling, return full device resolution. Warning: may exceed API limits.

compact.description: For dump: return paginated flat list of interactive elements (default: 20, use limit/offset for more).

amount.description: Scroll amount as fraction of screen (0-1, default: 0.5)

limit.description: For dump with compact: max elements to return (default: 20).

offset.description: For dump with compact: skip first N elements for pagination.
